content: You campaigned for Hillary and others didn’t, so what? Do you want credit because you spend your time defending what you believed in? Millions of people do it everyday and most of them get nothing in return. Stop complaining about people that don’t engage in politics and start thinking about what the Democratic party did wrong, and why people voted a guy that gave them passionate empty answers instead of a woman that offered no change. It doesn’t matter if all those who march didn’t participate actively in the campaign, what matters is that they are active now, and they can make things change.
